oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Building Organic Institutions in Nepal: Transformational Organic Leadership Perspectives
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Sharma, Sundar Kumar
Sharma, Ravina
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Social aspects
Technology transfer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: It is really challenging to transform the conventional trends of farming and consumption trends in Nepal. On the other hand, there is an opportunity to make use of the traditional ecological knowledge of the indigenous farmers for augmenting newly emerged organic farming practices. In this scenario, transformational organic leadership is needed to build organic institutions in Nepal.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Sharma, Sundar Kumar and Sharma, Ravina (2014) Building Organic Institutions in Nepal: Transformational Organic Leadership Perspectives. Paper at: IFOAM Organic World Congress 2014, Istanbul, Turkey, 13-15 October 2014. [Completed]
